name: BREAKING OUT OF MY SHELL: I'm Trying To Get a Girlfriend But I'm a F***ing Tortoise!
name_original: BREAKING OUT OF MY SHELL: I'm Trying To Get a Girlfriend But I'm a F***ing Tortoise!
description:
Story There’s a rumour going around school. 

That kind that gets the crowd fuzzy and giggly. Or those words that make people’s faces flash up red. It’s the rumour that goes:

“If you confess to your true love under the cherry tree, their love towards you will become true too.”

Maybe in a chance of a lifetime, I’ll make a promise of true love under that tree… But I have a problem… It’s not that I’m the school loser, or too nerdy for my own life. It’s not that I’m not top-fashioned in the looks department - everyone says I’m cute. It’s just that…

I’M A F***ING TORTOISE. AND I’M F***ING LATE FOR SCHOOL AGAIN!!! Characters

That's me!!! I want a girlfriend!!!

WHOA! This girl's really cute but I haven't played the game so I don't know who she is yet!!!


Nousagi is my best friend! She helps me with all my problems and carries me to classes! (I'M TOO SLOW TO WALK AROUND SCHOOL)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was created by Harriet Ford for the "So Bad it's Good" (SBIG) 2022 Game Jam. 

Current Game Version: 0.2. (Game Jam Release Build)
